sourcesContent: import s from"react";const h=({link:r,style:i={},wide:t=!1,width:n=t?"100%":300,height:o=t?80:380,frameBorder:a=0,allow:m="encrypted-media",...p})=>{const e=new URL(r);return e.pathname=e.pathname.replace(/\/intl-\w+\//,"/"),s.createElement("iframe",{title:"Spotify Web Player",src:`https://open.spotify.com/embed${e.pathname}`,width:n,height:o,frameBorder:a,allow:m,style:{borderRadius:8,...i},...p})};export{h as Spotify};
